abroad.translation[0].definitions[0].def: in or to a foreign country
abroad.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: She often goes abroad on business.
We never travelled abroad when we were kids.
A lot of goods are imported from abroad.
The books about Harry Potter have been very popular, both at home and abroad.
abroad.translation[0].definitions[1].def: if a feeling, piece of news etc is abroad, a lot of people feel it or know about it
abroad.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: There were rumours abroad that she was planning to resign.
